column4: trying to install natty, but when i got to the partition thing, i can't set the mount point manually. any idea why?
did you choose manual way or whatever it name is
i chose erase ubuntu and then i clicked advance partitioning
anything?
you should see your partitions and decide on witch one you will install and mark partition as root and ext4
i see all my partition. and i want to make new partition table from scratch. i'm planing to have root, /var, /cache, /cache1
if you don´t have valuable files on them delete all partitions and start making new
but when i want to make a mount point for the /cache and /cache1 i was unable to do so, due to the mount point option can't be manually edited
i'm making a new partitionin...like i said
why cache can you use media or something like that
i can use any name for the new partition, but the problem is the installer won't let me type manually. i have to choose from the drop down list
so choose whatever you want and don ´ know if you can type name manually
the options only "/", /boot /home, /tmp, /usr, /var, /srv, /opt, /usr/local can't i use other than that?
I don´t think so
so if i need other partition name other than that, how can i do that?
I really don´t know
thanks
sorry I was not much of help  :(
come on... its okay, we're all learning here. perhaps someone else know about my problem
tnx for comfort
